Objective : The purpose project evaluate active rehabilitation protocol adolescent slow recover follow sport-related concussion . Primary aim : confirm tolerability safety active rehabilitation protocol compare treatment usual control . Secondary aim : 1 ) document impact active rehabilitation post-concussion symptom return activity ; 2 ) explore intervention effect quality life , mood , energy level , balance , cognitive functioning , return pre-injury activity . Study design : A parallel group open label randomize comparison trial 30 adolescent slow recover follow sport-related concussion . After initial screen assessment , group receive treatment usual . Participants experimental group also participate sub-symptom threshold exercise , sport-specific coordination practice , positive visualisation daily . Outcome measure : The investigator monitor adverse event assess post-concussion symptom throughout study primary marker recovery . The investigator also report secondary outcome quality life , mood , energy level , balance cognitive functioning . Finally investigators record rate return school ( full time , part time ) rate return sport ( regular pre-injury vs. modify level ) .
